title: Field Remedy: 1713
subject:
Engine Z22SE, Z22YH - High oil
consumption
cause:
Tangential force of piston rings at lower
limit or out of specification.
production:
Piston rings with correct tangential force
have been introduced as of the following engine no's: Z22YH:
Engine-no. 11301385 (09.12.2003) Z22SE: Engine-no. 11307049
(08.01.2004)

remedyContent.text:
In case of complaint, carry out oil measuring procedure according TIS 2000
first (document 00030907).
Only if oil consumption exceeds the specification replace piston rings on
complaint engines.
